text: Very nice female doctor, thoroughly questioned and examined me

The female doctor thoroughly analyzed my results, examined me, and listened. She suggested a disease that was confirmed by the tests she directed me to. I also received recommendations on what additional tests I should perform and which doctor to go to with them. Thank you very much and I recommend the female doctor.

The female doctor is very professional but friendly. The medical history is thorough, health assessment and treatment explained in detail and understandably. You can see engagement, empathy, and great knowledge. The diagnosis was correct, and the treatment method was effective. This was my second visit to the female doctor. I highly recommend her practice.
The female doctor was very patient, considered both short and long-term treatment. Explained how the medications work, presented alternatives. The examination was thorough.
I recommend. Very engaged and empathetic female doctor.
Matter-of-fact, competent female doctor. Good, calm atmosphere. I'm glad we found her.
The female doctor was very nice and patient, explained everything properly to my dad.
Very thorough consultation, I was referred for further tests to deepen the diagnostics - I received clear and detailed answers to all my questions. Thank you
Very good, matter-of-factly, professionally, according to my expectations
Wonderful female doctor, a doctor with a calling, I'm finally recovering
Thank you for the visit. The female doctor approached the topic very thoroughly. Professional approach to the client. I am very satisfied with the visit. Best regards.
Very pleasant, attentive, empathetic female doctor. She gave me as much time as needed to get familiar with my case, I didn't feel rushed

The female doctor conducted a thorough examination, explained everything, answered all my questions understandably, and proposed treatment. Everything in a very nice and empathetic atmosphere. Highly recommend
Great approach and thorough patient interview. Warmly recommend
The female doctor is very engaged and has enormous knowledge, I'm glad I found her.

I am very satisfied with my first visit to the female doctor. I have comparison with other neurologists from Warsaw, and the female doctor stands out as very professional among them. She conducted a detailed interview and discussed further steps. Waiting for improvement.
The female doctor is very engaged and nice. Explains everything thoroughly. Highly recommend the female doctor.

A doctor with an excellent approach to the patient! Full professionalism and engagement. The medical interview was conducted very thoroughly, and the prescribed treatment brought results. Warmly recommend!
The female doctor asked in detail about my symptoms, considered all possible treatment options, selected medications after which I feel better, thank you very much for your help
Dr. Jan Kowalski is very meticulous and engaged, performed very thorough
